info.author: Espen Moe-Nilssen
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
===================
medialog.fullnamefield
===================

-------
Purpose
-------

medialog.fullnamefield adds a new Archetypes field for storing fullname fields.

What makes it special?

*  It autofills the fullname field with the fullname of the currently authenticated member.

How do I use it?

See the example Archetype content type created in:
medialog/fullnamefield/contents/fullname.py



Changelog
=========

0.1 - Unreleased
----------------

* Initial release

Contributors:
-------------

- based on the work done on medialog.emailfield done by JC Brand <brand@syslab.com>. Thanks a lot!
